svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: National average learning outcomes vs expenditure per student, 2010
National average learning outcomes correspond to test scores across standardized, psychometrically-robust
international and regional student achievement tests. Expenditure per student corresponds to general government
spending in primary education divided by total primary enrollment. Spending is adjusted to account for price
differences between countries. All estimates correspond to 2010 or closest year with available data.
Source: Altinok, Angrist, and Patrinos (2018), World Bank
